CustomField.formula: IF( TODAY() < Data_da_Proxima_Atualiza_o__c - 60 , "ATUALIZADO" + " " + IMAGE("https://hospcom--c.na25.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153100000815oV", "" , 12, 12), IF(AND( Data_da_Proxima_Atualiza_o__c -60 < TODAY(),TODAY() < Data_da_Proxima_Atualiza_o__c ) , "ATENÇÃO, ATUALIZAR P.O.P" + " " + IMAGE("https://hospcom--c.na25.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153100000815oa", "" , 12, 12) ,"DESATUALIZADO" + " " + IMAGE("https://hospcom--c.na25.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153100000815of", "" , 12, 12)))
CustomField.label: Status do P.O.P
